content: krissy s mountainside bucket hat is a special design for the crochet cancer challenge it s an honor to participate in such an amazing event to raise awareness about the impact of cancer this year s hat is dedicated to my dear friend and fellow crocheter kris who has been fighting breast cancer over the past year krissy s mountainside bucket hat offers texture and style as a classic bucket hat that can be worn on a chilly day when running errands or social events have fun adding a brooch or handmade appliqué learn more details about this yearly event at sweet potato 3 2 i invite you to join the creations by courtney community on facebook for exclusive coupons giveaways and more take me there ©2022 creations by courtney this pattern is not to be duplicated or resold and not to be reproduced commercially you may sell finished products on etsy at farmers markets and craft fairs but please credit creations by courtney as the pattern s author 2 https //sweetpotato3 com/category/cancerchallenge/
